name: SIMULACRA
description: An interactive horror experience of exploring a missing woman’s phone.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Dual Core Processor or newer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT, AMD Radeon HD 2400, Intel HD or any OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card released from 2012 onwards DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
